sourcesContent:
most popularfoods

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductsService } from 'src/app/services/user/products/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { allProducts=[] constructor(private products:ProductsService){ products.allProducts().subscribe((res)=>{ this.allProducts= res.data },(e)=>{ console.log(e); }) } }
